title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server that lets you run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a simple async/sync client.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, Deno, and browsers via a lightweight fetch wrapper.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama chat, completion, and embedding models to the LangChain ecosystem.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style) with multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG, and user management.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama providing synchronous and asynchronous APIs for chat, generate, pull, and embed endpoints.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama: simple idiomatic Ruby interface to chat, generate, and manage local LLMs.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Unofficial Rust CLI that wraps Ollama’s REST API with interactive chat, model search, and conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions and chat sidebar.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama providing Generator and ChatGenerator nodes for retrieval-augmented generation pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with recipes for function-calling, structured output, vision models, and fine-tuning workflows.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and docker-compose stacks for CPU and GPU (CUDA, ROCm) deployments of Ollama server.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling, PVC, and GPU node-selector support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store + Streamlit UI for local document Q&A.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that exposes Ollama models in chat channels with slash commands, moderation, and per-user rate limits.
